Another question from today's @InfoQ Live was how to automate governance. It's a bit adjacent, but @kgb1001001 has interesting ideas about automating architectural governance: https://t.co/1rx3zpDEWj
For 'governance as in compliance', the last section of Lean Enterprise is great.
